name: Horse Riding 3D: Show Jumping Full
description:
Do you like horses or derby? These amazing horses are waiting for you! Train one of this horses to make it a real prize horse with this Horse Riding 3D: Show Jumping game! Saddle up your horse! It’s time to win in this epic show contest!

Ride fast, jump over obstacles, and enjoy the tournament! Complete different show jumping tasks during the contest – from Liverpool and open water to oxer and triple bar! Avoid failings and don’t be disappointed by your mistakes – just try again, and you’d succeed! Earn money to buy new horses – Oldenburg, Westphalian, Holsteiner and other famous breeds - and level up their attributes - improving your horse means the improvement of your results, so don’t forget about it.

Join the tournament, win the ride and collect all achievements and medals! Do your best and challenge the best riders in the world to win the prize and become the champion! Try two game modes – competition and training! Train your horses do improve their skills and participate jumping tournament to test them in real conditions. Feel yourself like a real horse trainer with Horse Riding 3D: Show Jumping and have fun!

Horse Riding 3D: Show Jumping features:

Various breeds of horses - Oldenburg, Westphalian, Holsteiner and other
Realistic riding obstacles – from oxer to Liverpool
Two game modes – ‘Training’, where you simply train your horse, and ‘Contest’, where you participate in show
Simple and intuitive controls

Have you ever dream to feel yourself like a jockey at horse jumping show? Check our Horse Riding 3D: Show Jumping – great app for all riding simulator lovers - and do your best to achieve the best results!
